data.title: What's Figma's measuring unit?
data.meta_description: I know that Figma has a lot of presets fo a bunch of frames, but if I want to create a design that I can measure in mm, the relaion is not 1:1. Could somebody give me any guide or standard measurement so I can change the…
data.text:
I know that Figma has a lot of presets fo a bunch of frames, but if I want to create a design that I can measure in mm, the relaion is not 1:1. Could somebody give me any guide or standard measurement so I can change the sizes myself please?

Hey @Hamzat_Ademola, thanks for reaching out!

Can you please clarify what you’re looking for? Figma doesn’t have standard size iOS or Android icons.
